# Description
Tetris Mania is a work in progress tetris game created using SDL2 and CPP. All the textures and assets are self made. It is open source so contributions are welcome.

# Installation
You have to compile the game for your system but all the library files are included. There is also a makefile included and you can use the following commands to compile and run

        make all
        ./tetris
